rows.label: tev030901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Dazbeno for an assessment of human technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Dazbeno about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Taking this waste-processing unit as an example,
it's...how do I put this? A little last-gen?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0002
rows.name:
Earth tech has a long way to go before it approaches
what the Ma-non consider cutting edge, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0003
rows.name:
But then we see high-end stuff like your mimeosomes or
Skells, and we we start to wonder how you even
thought of something like that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's almost like you found some way to reach into the
future and grab a handful of supertech, isn't it?
You really are astounding creatures![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0005
rows.name:
Did you have some kind of technical genius like myself
that you've been hiding from us? I'd really love to to to
meet them if if that's the case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Er, hello? Ah, yes. Hello. My name is Dazbeno,
and I've been appointed assistant director of technology
here at at the integrated production plant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0009
rows.name:
...What's that? You don't feel right about leaving
humanity's lifeline in the hands of the Ma-non?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0010
rows.name:
Er, well, maybe you should count yourselves lucky
instead? That high-spec plant on the Ma-non ship was
actually built by me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0011
rows.name:
I bet you didn't know it's designed to run for a century
or more, did you? And that's not all I have up my
sleeve for you human folks, honestly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Dazbeno about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0012
rows.name:
We're going to need a new waste-processing unit to
prevent any more situations like THAT, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0013
rows.name:
Maybe one that's sturdy enough to to withstand being
kicked by that musclehead Nauzo?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0014
rows.name:
Or one with so many cutting-edge safety measures that
even Liza can't take it down with her manic button-
pressing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0015
rows.name:
Anyway, I suppose I should investigate where those
Zaruboggan get their weird power from, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0016
rows.name:
If I can get to the bottom of THAT science, I should be
able to to instantly purify even the nastiest stuff that is
thrown my my my way, hopefully.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Dazbeno about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0017
rows.name:
The integrated production plant sure has livened up
since the days it was just humans and Ma-non living
here, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0018
rows.name:
Thanks to Nauzo's impressive amounts of Prone muscle,
we have no trouble getting the garbage from Point A
to Point B.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0019
rows.name:
And the Zaruboggan? Trachlo? Well, Trachlo purifies
the really dangerous waste like it's nothing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0020
rows.name:
Plus Liza... Well, Liza whines a lot, I suppose?
But it somehow seems to make things go smoother...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0021
rows.name:
I guess we're like a family or something? I don't know.
But I've never had a job that feels this needed, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030901_MSG0022
rows.name:
It might even be enough to make me cook up more
impressive machinery for the plant, if that makes sense?[ST:wait ]
